name: Wildwood
description:
Dash your way to victory in this fast-paced forest arena beat-em-up.

 

The logging company came to your forest before you were born.

They cut down your ancestors and burned your elders.

You are too small to make a difference but you must try anyway.

You must try to grow up.

Little acorn, it is time to fight.

  

 andrewhowizon ~ Design/Art/Programming.

@MatthewRockVGM ~ SFX/Music.

 

 

 

Made for the #CFNgamejam in around a week. The theme was "Growing Up".
